message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe it would be beneficial for both of us if you were to acquire it. I am offering this exceptional item to you for $15000. This price reflects its high quality and unique features. I look forward to your response.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on your product. However, I believe we can find a price that suits both of us. I am willing to pay $12000 for the product.
